DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect Thai massage electromyogram patient chronic upper back pain associate myofascial trigger point .
DOC.criteria: Male female Age 18 50 year old The participant experience spontaneous upper pain longer 12 week ( chronic ) least one trigger point present trapezius muscle . Trigger point diagnose presence focal tenderness taut band pain recognition . The participant able follow instruction . Good communication cooperation . A history follow disease disorder : Cervical radiculopathy Contraindications traditional Thai massage Contagious skin disease Injury inflammation muscle Bone fracture and/or joint dislocation Open wound Uncontrolled hypertension Drug and/or alcohol intoxication
